Package com.metro.model

Class PathResult

java.lang.Object
com.metro.model.PathResult
public final class PathResult extends Object
Model class representing the result of metro path search. Contains information about found route, travel time and possible errors.

  • Constructor Details

    • PathResult

      public PathResult(List<String> path, int totalTime)
      Constructor for successful path search result.
      Parameters:
      path - list of stations forming the path
      totalTime - total travel time in minutes
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if path is null/empty or time is negative

    • PathResult

      public PathResult(String errorMessage)
      Constructor for error result.
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - error message
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if error message is null or empty

    • PathResult

      public PathResult(List<String> path, int totalTime, String errorMessage)
      Full constructor for path search result.
      Parameters:
      path - list of station path (can be null or empty for error)
      totalTime - total travel time in minutes
      errorMessage - error message (null if no error)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if both path and errorMessage are null

  • Method Details

    • getPath

      public List<String> getPath()
      Returns path as list of stations. For successful result returns unmodifiable list of stations. For error result returns empty unmodifiable list.
      Returns:
      list of station path

    • getTotalTime

      public int getTotalTime()
      Returns total travel time in minutes. For error result returns 0.
      Returns:
      travel time in minutes

    • getErrorMessage

      public String getErrorMessage()
      Returns error message. For successful result returns null.
      Returns:
      error message or null

    • isSuccess

      public boolean isSuccess()
      Checks if path search was successful.
      Returns:
      true if path successfully found, false in case of error

    • hasError

      public boolean hasError()
      Checks if error occurred during path search.
      Returns:
      true if error occurred, false in case of success

    • getStationCount

      public int getStationCount()
      Returns number of stations in path. For error result returns 0.
      Returns:
      number of stations in path

    • getFormattedResult

      public String getFormattedResult()
      Returns textual representation of path. For successful result returns string with station enumeration. For error result returns error message.
      Returns:
      textual representation of result

    • getShortDescription

      public String getShortDescription()
      Returns short path description.
      Returns:
      string in format "from â†’ to (X minutes, Y stations)"

    • success

      public static PathResult success(List<String> path, int totalTime)
      Creates successful path search result.
      Parameters:
      path - list of station path
      totalTime - total travel time
      Returns:
      PathResult object with successful result

    • error

      public static PathResult error(String errorMessage)
      Creates error result.
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - error message
      Returns:
      PathResult object with error

    • error

      public static PathResult error(Exception exception)
      Creates error result based on exception.
      Parameters:
      exception - exception that caused error
      Returns:
      PathResult object with error
